attributes.action: Review the vehicle tax system as it is based on sceptical scientific theory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current legislation for vehicle tax is based on CO2 emissions.  This, although measurable per vehicle, is taxed on the assumption that the vehicle is directly responsible for climate change.  However, based on CO2 emissions, the average car is pitiful in comparison to the average human exhaling during exercise. Cycling, for example (approx 1000-1500g/km).
